title: No Scrubs
lyrics:
[intro] (Cm) (Gm) (D) (Gm) x2
 
A (Cm)scrub is a guy that thinks (Gm) he's fly
And is (D)also known as a (Gm) buster
(Cm)Always talkin' about (Gm)what he wants
And just (D)sits on his broke (Gm)ass
 
So ((Cm)no) I don't (Gm)want your number
((D)No) I don't want to (Gm)give you mine
And ((Cm)no) I don't want to (Gm)meet you nowhere
((D)No) I don't want (Gm)none of your time
 
[chorus]
And (Cm)no, I don't (Gm)want no scrub
A (D)scrub is a guy that can't (Gm)get no love from (Cm)me
Hangin' out the (Gm)passenger side
Of his (D)best friend's ride
(Gm)Tryin' to holla at (Cm)me
I don't (Gm)want no scrub
A (D)scrub is a guy that can't (Gm)get no love from (Cm)me
Hangin' out the (Gm)passenger side
Of his (D)best friend's ride
(Gm)Tryin' to holler at me [straight in]
 
There's a (Cm)scrub checkin' me
But his (Gm)game is kinda weak
And I (D)know that he cannot (Gm)approach me
Cuz I'm (Cm)lookin' like class and he's (Gm)lookin' like trash
Can't (D)get with a dead-beat (Gm)ass
 
So ((Cm)no) I don't (Gm)want your number
((D)No) I don't want to (Gm)give you mine
And ((Cm)no) I don't want to (Gm)meet you nowhere
((D)No) I don't want (Gm)none of your time
 
[chorus]
(Cm)No, I don't (Gm)want no scrub
A (D)scrub is a guy that can't (Gm)get no love from (Cm)me
Hangin' out the (Gm)passenger side
Of his (D)best friend's ride
(Gm)Tryin' to holla at (Cm)me
I don't (Gm)want no scrub
A (D)scrub is a guy that can't (Gm)get no love from (Cm)me
Hangin' out the (Gm)passenger side
Of his (D)best friend's ride
(Gm)Tryin' to holler at me [straight to bridge]
 
[bridge, single strum]
If you don't (Eb)have a car and you're walking
Oh (D)yes son, I'm talking to you
If you (Gm7)live at home with your momma
Oh (Gm7)yes son, I'm talking to you
[normal strum] If you (Eb)have a shorty that you don't show love
Oh (D)yes son, I'm talking to you
Wanna (Gm)get me with (D)no money
Oh (Eb)no, I don't (D)want no
(Cm)No (Gm) (no scrub) (D)scrub (Gm) (no love)
(Cm)No (Gm) (no scrub) (D)scrub (Gm) no, no
(Cm)No (Gm) (no scrub) (D)scrub (Gm)no, no, no-no
(Cm)No (Gm) (no scrub) (D)scrub (Gm) no, no
 
[chorus]
(Cm)No, I don't (Gm)want no scrub
A (D)scrub is a guy that can't (Gm)get no love from (Cm)me
Hangin' out the (Gm)passenger side
Of his (D)best friend's ride
(Gm)Tryin' to holla at (Cm)me
I don't (Gm)want no scrub
A (D)scrub is a guy that can't (Gm)get no love from (Cm)me
Hangin' out the (Gm)passenger side
Of his (D)best friend's ride
(Gm)Tryin' to holler at (Cm)me
I don't (Gm)want no scrub (D) (Gm)
(Cm) I don't (Gm)want no scrub (D) (Gm) [end]
